    • Field Detail

      • lists

        Stack<String> lists
        Keeps track of lists (ol, ul). On bottom of Stack is the outermost list and on top of Stack is the most nested list

      • olNextIndex

        Stack<Integer> olNextIndex
        Tracks indexes of ordered lists so that after a nested list ends we can continue with correct index of outer list

      • tableHtmlBuilder

        StringBuilder tableHtmlBuilder
        Running HTML table string based off of the root table tag. Root table tag being the tag which isn't embedded within any other table tag. Example: ...
        ...
        ...

      • tableTagLevel

        int tableTagLevel
        Tells us which level of table tag we're on; ultimately used to find the root table tag.
